description: Triggers based on various lifecycle events, like when a workflow is activated
activationMessage: Your workflow will now trigger executions on the event you have defined.

properties.displayName: This node is deprecated and would not be updated in the future. Please use 'n8n Trigger' node instead.
properties.name: oldVersionNotice
events
properties.description:
Specifies under which conditions an execution should happen:
  • Active Workflow Updated: Triggers when this workflow is updated
  • Workflow Activated: Triggers when this workflow is activated

options.name: Active Workflow Updated
options.description: Triggers when this workflow is updated

options.name: Workflow Activated
options.description: Triggers when this workflow is activated

name: n8n-nodes-base.workflowTrigger
